Name: Kingston
Description: The capital and largest city of Jamaica, known for its vibrant cultural scene and as the country s political and economic center.

Name: Clarendon
Description: A region known for its agriculture, particularly sugarcane and bananas, and its scenic landscapes.

Name: Manchester
Description: A landlocked region in the southern part of the island, known for its cool climate and agriculture, including citrus fruits and coffee.

Name: St. Elizabeth
Description: A rural region known for its extensive agricultural activities, particularly sugar and bananas, and its beaches.

Name: St. James
Description: A popular tourist region, home to Montego Bay, known for its beaches, resorts, and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Trelawny
Description: A region known for its beaches, resorts, and historic sites, as well as agriculture including sugarcane and bananas.

Name: Hanover
Description: A coastal region known for its beaches and the historic town of Lucea.

Name: Westmoreland
Description: A southern coastal region known for its agricultural production, particularly sugar, and its beach towns.

Name: St. Ann
Description: A region known for its beaches, particularly in Ocho Rios, and the famous Dunn s River Falls.

Name: St. Mary
Description: A northeastern region known for its lush vegetation, waterfalls, and as a historical area with sugar estates.

Name: Portland
Description: A region known for its beautiful beaches, lush vegetation, and ecotourism opportunities.

Name: St. Thomas
Description: A region known for its natural beauty, including rivers and beaches, and a more laid-back atmosphere compared to other areas.

Name: St. Kitts
Description: A region that is part of the popular St. Kitts and Nevis federation, with beautiful beaches and a rich history.
